CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 013EU

ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: Servicios de programación de la formación
Services relatifs aux programmes de formation
Serviços relacionados com programas de formação
Услуги, свързани с програми за обучение

CONTENTS.P: Tekststykke, der skal tilføjes:
VI.3)Additional information
The contract period will be from 9.4.2018 until 31.12.2021 with an option to extend for a further 2 years.

The current anticipated value of this contract is 505 500 GBP exclusive of VAT and bids that are received over budget will not be considered. However, as this contract is in the form of a framework contract, subject to additional funding and the success of the programme further programmes may be commissioned. The total overall spend on this contract including any extension will not exceed 1 500 000 GBP excluding VAT.
